entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $19.95 [$19.95 ~ $19.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö$19.95
  • AnnualÔºö$6.00
  • MonthlyÔºö$0.99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions. ‚ñ† KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues ‚Ä¢ Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments ‚ñ† COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies ‚ñ† SMART FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances ‚Ä¢ Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel ‚Ä¢ Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule ‚Ä¢ Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders ‚Ä¢ Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization ‚ñ† MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS We're dedicated to one mission ‚Äî helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: The Last Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters! BALANCE RISK & REWARD Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!‚Äã BECOME OVERPOWERED Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!‚Äã FIND SECRETS Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials! PLAY WITH FRIENDS Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: My Child Lebensborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Polygon: "My Child Lebensborn tells a disturbing tale about innocents in the aftermath of WW2‚Äù LevelUp: ‚ÄúThe strongest game experience that I have ever had.‚Äù You adopt a young Lebensborn child in Norway after WW2, but parenting will be hard as your child grows up in a hostile and hateful environment. See a different side of the war, inspired by the true stories of the Lebensborn children. Discover how hatred of our enemies continues to create victims, even after victory. Discover their past and support them in the present. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying and the passing of blame. Can you help Klaus/Karin cope with the heavy inheritance of the German occupation, so they will find their place in a country that is celebrating its freedom? You can make the difference. Key Features: - Influence the child‚Äôs feelings, personality and worldview through your choices. - Look for the effects of your choices in your child‚Äôs expressions and body language. - Explore a gripping storyline based upon true events. - Earn money as you work, then cook, craft, forage, and play. - Use your time and meager resources wisely. - Adopt a boy or girl, and support them through a defining year of their life. What is new in the Remaster? More activities: Spend more time with your child and enjoy a variety of activities together as your little one grows. - Try out more recipes - Craft pine cone animals - Skip stones at the lake - Pick flowers in the forest - Enjoy seasonal activities together And More! Perhaps there is a new way of using the newspaper clippings that you get in the mail every now and then? Make new memories: Your journal now holds more memories from the year you spent together with your child. Who can throw away the beautiful flowers you picked out together on a beautiful spring day? Decorate the rooms with your memories. Your journal will hold your struggles, as well as the happy moments. Interact with your child: Play and interact with your child more freely in this remastered version. Manage your time and resources while trying as many activities with your child as possible! Money is limited as always, but perhaps there are more reasons to not work overtime after all. Improved Graphics: Bringing My Child Lebensborn's graphics to today's level, tickle and pet your child to get heartwarming reactions out of them! The beauty of Norwegian nature is now more apparent, and you have more things to do outdoors! Caution: Some devices with only 1GB available memory have shown problems with running this game. For technical support, please contact us at support@sareptastudio.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

In-App Purchases

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. ‚óá 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills ‚óá The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild ‚óá Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

entry.title: Sismo: Vibration Meter & Alert
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes ! How it works Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes. Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area. Check the vibrations with your phone! Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease. Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options. Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views. Special Views ; ‚óè OSCILLOSCOPE The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk. ‚óè METRONOME Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance. ‚óè GEYSER Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound. ‚óè WAVE The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision. Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device. In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

Lead German forces on the rise towards the East or defend mother Russia on the Soviet side. Choose the right tactic of warfare and earn your stripes as an ingenious Commander at the FROZEN FRONT! Experience mind-blowing World War 2 battles in the brilliant new military STRATEGY-sim by HandyGames‚Ñ¢! MISSION BRIEFING FIGHT through the bone-chilling cold of the 1941 Eastern Front! COMBAT enemy positions with tanks and infantry! SHOOT hostile headquarters with mighty bomber wings! EMPLACE your artillery in rough terrain! SUPPLY your army with goods and ammunition! DEFEND yourself against superior numbers of enemies! - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Turn-based strategy action in WW2 - Thrilling campaigns and challenging missions - Hot-Hand multiplayer battles - Historical German and Soviet units - Repairs, camouflage and fortification of units during the battles - Infantry, artillery, tanks and warplanes for both fractions - Hex grid for the best overview possible - Detailed graphics and super-realistic sounds Thank you for playing 1941 Frozen Front!

entry.title: Clouds & Sheep 2 Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

  • 50 GemsÔºö$3.99
  • 250 GemsÔºö$15.99
  • 1400 GemsÔºö$79.99
  • 650 GemsÔºö$40.99

Application Description

In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends‚Äô needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals‚Äô different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they‚Äôll bring tiny lambs into the world! Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock‚Äôs pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky. Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Awesome sequel of the top game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù - Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth! - Simulation game with adorable sheep - Take care of your flock - Raise sweet little lambs - Actively play with your animals - Give them many different items and objects - Grow and harvest various resources - Shear your sheep - Customize their pasture - Control the weather - Day-night cycle - Open-ended game set in a 3D world - Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family - MFi game controller support - Game Center support Thank you for playing ‚ÄòClouds & Sheep 2‚Äô! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: http://www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/handygames Stay tuned on Google+: http://goo.gl/qkjngm Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Description

Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy! FEATURES - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - City-building gameplay set in medieval times - Cute inhabitants with their own daily routines - Complex economy sim and deep production chains - Dozens of different town and production buildings - Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits - Meaningful seasons and weather effects - Devastating disasters like fire, disease, drought and many more - Diverse scenarios and challenging tasks - Unrestricted sandbox gameplay mode - Game Center support

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$3.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Are you ready, kids? Play as SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy and show the evil Plankton that crime pays even less than Mr. Krabs. Want to save Bikini Bottom from lots of rampant robots with your mighty bubbles? Of course, you do! Want to underpants bungee jump? Why wouldn't you! The battle is on! Features: - Play as SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy and use their unique sets of skills - Thwart Plankton's evil plan to rule Bikini Bottom with his army of wacky robots - Meet countless characters from the beloved series - Faithful remake of one of the best SpongeBob games ever created - High-end visuals, modern resolutions, and carefully polished gameplay - Game Center support - Full controller support Thank you for playing SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: HandyGames Subscribe to our YouTube channel: HandyGames Check news on Twitter: @handy_games Follow us on Instagram: handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.
